alert.note: Alert for Casey; Lincoln (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:22AM EDT until July 18 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in central Kentucky... Casey County in central Kentucky... * Until 500 AM EDT. * At 422 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located from near Stanford to 6 miles northeast of Liberty to 13 miles east of Campbellsville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, Stanford, Crab Orchard, Hustonville, Boneyville, Mintonville, Lawhorn Hill, Teddy, Gilpin, and Broughtentown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
